definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The seamy side of life includes crime and other evils.
sentences.chinese: 生活的陰暗面包括犯罪和其它邪惡事情。

sentences.english: Of course there is a well-known dark side to contemporary street rap.
sentences.chinese: 當然，現代街道對話有一個衆所周知的陰暗面。

sentences.english: Enter the shadier side of the scrap-metal business.
sentences.chinese: 這就是廢金屬回收產業的陰暗面。

sentences.english: You're not aware of the seamy side of life.
sentences.chinese: 你還沒有見到社會的陰暗面。

sentences.english: Soon, evil spirits in the house try to take Sally to the dark side.
sentences.chinese: 不久，在家裏辟邪儘量採取薩莉的陰暗面。

sentences.english: Do you really want to battle your dark side year after year?
sentences.chinese: 你真地想年復一年去和你的陰暗面作鬥爭嗎？

sentences.english: So every person has a dark side- and I know now what the vice-principal's dark side sounds like.
sentences.chinese: 而我今天見識了我們副校長的陰暗面是什麼樣子了。

sentences.english: Female rock singers' lyrics works reflect the awakening of female consciousness in China from different respect.
sentences.chinese: 何勇則在搖滾歌詞中反映並控訴社會的陰暗面。

sentences.english: Those who find faults with other offer lose their glamour .
sentences.chinese: 愛找別人陰暗面的人，自己也常又失去魅力。

sentences.english: This is the blue demons array, showing the dark side of Mu mental inside.
sentences.chinese: 這是心魔陣，藍沐在裏面顯出了心理的陰暗面。

sentences.english: But all this has a dark side.
sentences.chinese: 然而這一切都有其陰暗面。

sentences.english: However, this does bring up an issue about your potential dark side.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這項我們提出了一個你潛在陰暗面的問題。

sentences.english: How to solve psychological the seamy side?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣解決心理的陰暗面？

sentences.english: The secret enquiry this time is aimed at completely exposing the underside of society.
sentences.chinese: 這次暗訪一定要把社會的陰暗面全部暴光。

sentences.english: What does your seamy side tell you?
sentences.chinese: 你的陰暗面告訴你什麼？

definition: lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
bizarre/paradoxical/a paradox (from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子)
lit. dragons and snakes mingle (idiom)/fig. a mix of good people and scumbags
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
